item.title: From Host to Hive: Transferring Logs with PowerShell + SCP
item.description: This post describes how to automate the conversion and transfer of Winlogbeat logs from opf-mbr01 to opf-log01 using PowerShell and SCP.

item.title: Precision Logging: Exporting Winlogbeat Data from OPFORGE
item.description: We configure Winlogbeat on opf-mbr01 to export JSON-formatted logs to disk. This allows enriched post-processing before ingesting into SOF-ELK.

item.title: Ingest to Analyze: Bringing SOF-ELK Online
item.description: This post walks through the deployment and configuration of opf-log01, the centralized logging VM for OPFORGE, powered by SOF-ELK. From network setup to confirming ELK stack services, this guide ensures a solid foundation for ingesting security-relevant data.

item.title: Forging the Core: Building OPFORGE's Domain Controller
item.description: In this post, we configure OPFORGE’s foundational infrastructure by building the domain controller opf-dc01. We’ll define our network structure, stand up Active Directory, and prepare the environment for workstation and log server integration.
